data.name: Fencing Girl Break
data.detailed_description:
The DLC content:
In the character preview screen, women can take off their clothes and dance in the nude.

A total of six women can interact.
data.about_the_game:
The DLC content:
In the character preview screen, women can take off their clothes and dance in the nude.

A total of six women can interact.
data.short_description: This is a fencing competition game. According to the prompt of quick time event (QTE) on the screen, press the corresponding key to avoid the girl's attack and fight back. When you win the competition, you will get the favor of girls and interact with girls.
data.supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 4160T or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT720 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1.2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 4460 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1.2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Nude characters will appear in the selection interface and battle scenes.
